paper_abstract: This paper deals with blow-up properties of positive solutions to semi-linear parabolic system with nonlocal sources, subject to null Dirichlet boundary conditions. We first obtain some sufficient conditions for blow-up in finite time and a necessary condition for the two components of the solution blow up simultaneously, and then establish uniform blow-up profiles in the interior and estimates of the boundary layer. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Uniform blow-up profiles and boundary layer for a parabolic system with nonlocal sources
